scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm ci --production=false && npm run build && npm prune --production
scripts.build:dev: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm ci --production=false && npm run build && npm prune --production
scripts.cypress: BROWSER=false start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:3000 'cd client && npx cypress open'
scripts.cypress:ci: start-server-and-test server http://localhost:4000/ok 'cd client && npx cypress run --env ci=true'
scripts.full-install: npm ci && npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
